## Slots

| Slot                    | Description                         |
| ----------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `"additional-guidance"` | Slot for additional guidance.       |
| `"primary-guidance"`    | Required slot for primary guidance. |
| `"progress"`            | Required slot for progress.         |
